sense.def:
Kar je
fast
, se premika, deluje ali se dogaja z veliko hitrostjo.

seg.quote: I ran as fast as I could.

T.def: Izraz uporabljamo v vprašanjih in trditvah o hitrosti.

seg.quote: ...looking out of the windows to see how fast we were going.

sense.def:
Fast
pomeni tudi način, da se nekaj zgodi brez odlašanja ali odloga.

seg.quote: Treat stains as fast as possible.

sense.def:
Kadar je ročna ali stenska ura
fast
, kaže več, kot je v resnici.

Kadar je nekaj
held or fixed fast
, je pritrjeno ali drži zelo trdno.

seg.quote: He saw a small man, his leg held fast in the lion trap, making desperate efforts to free himself.

sense.def:
To fast
pomeni, da nekaj časa ne jemo nobene hrane, navadno zaradi verskih razlogov.

seg.quote: He fasts for a whole day every week.
During my fast I lost fifteen pounds.

sense.def:
To be fast asleep
pomeni trdno spati.

To hold fast to an idea or course of action
pomeni trdno še naprej verjeti v neko idejo ali izvajati neko dejanje.

seg.quote: He was determined to hold fast to his beliefs.
